column4: does anyone remember what is the option that is supposed to be off/disabled for nvidia agp cards to show correctly the resolution in gnome? something with TwinView.. ?
you can use the nvidia settings program instead
negative, it usually breaks my configuration :\
you can "sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf"  and edit the Modes in the Section "Screen" in it,  ive done that and it worked fine
